A dominant force in fashion, Sam Edelman has made an indelible impact on some of the most renowned contemporary footwear brands over the past 45 years – launching the footwear division for Ralph Lauren and Esprit, holding an executive role at Candies, and as a co-founder of Kenneth Cole.

For more than 40 years, founders Sam and Libby Edelman have been a force to be reckoned with in contemporary fashion. Throughout their careers, the Edelmans have touched some of the world’s most influential brands, including Ralph Lauren, Calvin Klein, Candies, Kenneth Cole and Esprit.
